ImyaTweaks.Title: Adjustments to the Quay Street OW

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Use New Texture and Model For Quay Street OW MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines whether the mod Quay Street with new texture and changed model or the vanilla Quay Street should be used in the OW (default = ON = Mod default settings)

ImyaTweaks.Title: Adjustments to the Quay Street NW

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Use New Texture and Model For Quay Street NW MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines whether the mod Quay Street with new texture and changed model or the vanilla Quay Street should be used in the NW (default = ON = Mod default settings)
